response.overview: Learning something new is always exciting for Curious George — whether he's flying high, getting all wet, creating sticky situations, or even losing his way. Come along with the world's most inquisitive monkey — and some feathered and furry friends — in this playful collection of episodes from the two-time Daytime Emmy Award®-winning series airing on PBS KIDS®. You'll find out that the world is way more fun when you learn things together!
response.title: Curious George: Fun with Friends
